thread.section_title: Saatva Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatva Mattress | saatvamattress.com
thread.title: Britt

author: Britt
title: Britt
text:
I am having just a little issue with my mattress but I can not tell you how wonderful Saatva is and resolving things and the customer service person I have helping me Melisa J is absolutely amazing she is getting my problem resolved right away. I have worked in customer service for many years and let me tell you Melisa J is a true professional. Thank you Melisa J
and thank you Saatva I am sure we will get this worked out.
